Body:
normal = Normal(rand=None, mu=0.0, sigma=2, xlim=(-3, 3), N=7)
x, y = normal.data
for i, j in zip(x, [-3, -2, -1, 0, 1, 2, 3]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
for i, j in zip(y, [0.0647588, 0.12098536, 0.17603266, 0.19947114, 
    0.17603266, 0.12098536, 0.0647588]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
